channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Want to plant trees to offset fossil fuels? You’d need all of North and Central America, study finds
item.description: Planting trees can help save the planet, right? A new study finds that to offset all the planet-warming carbon emissions from fossil fuel reserves, trees would have to entirely cover an area the size of North and Central America combined.

item.title: Key takeaways from the acquittal of Karen Read in her Boston police officer boyfriend’s death
Ducks return to a Long Island farm that lost its entire flock to the bird flu
